name: vulnerable_postgres_version
title: Current Postgres version has security patches available
description: Upgrade your postgres database to apply important security patches
detail: We have detected that the current version of postgres, supabase-postgres-17.4.1.069, has outstanding security patches available. Upgrade your database to receive the latest security patches.
